content: कच्चित् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} A particle of (1) interrogation (often translateable by ‘I hope’); कच्चित् अहमिव विस्मृतवानसि त्वं <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; कच्चिन्मृगीणामनघा प्रसूतिः <ls>R. 5. 7</ls>; also <ls n="R. 5.">5</ls>, <ls n="R. 5.">6</ls>, <ls n="R. 5.">8</ls>, <ls n="R. 5.">9</ls> ({%b%}) joy; ({%c%}) auspiciousness.
